name: The Missing Pigs Of McReary Farm
name_original: The Missing Pigs Of McReary Farm
description:
Can You Help Andy The Pig, Solve The Biggest Conspiracy Of All Time,

"The Missing Pigs Of McReary Farm"

"Everytime Our Farm Owner Mr. McReary visits the city market, anyone of our "pig brothers" mysteriously disappears. Our Intel says that he has something to do with this. Which is why we are sending you Andy! to find out what happened to our pink brothers!"

You play as a pig. So.... "YOU'RE A PIG!" (just had to say that)

Can't solve the mystery? It's ok, just enjoy BEING A PIG :|

CONTROLS:

  • 'SPACE' to OINK / SKIP TEXT.
  • 'MOUSE' to LOOK AROUND
  • 'W, A, S, D' to MOVE.
  • 'ESC' to PAUSE/UNPAUSE.

CREDITS:

Kevin Macleod (Music), and some props (barrels, crates, planks, fountain etc.)from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/historic/polylised-medieva... everything else (shops, humans, pig(s), lightLamps, banners etc. ) made by me :)

for 

Holistic3D Lockdown Game Jam
